title: A Flurry of Fluffy Feline Funnies for Fuzzy Feline Expurrts to Purruse While Weathering the Cold Winter Winds
description: Brrrrrrrrr….it's cold outside, feline fam! All of a sudden, we're wrapped up in giant, poofy coats, bundled up in scarves and hats, and wishing we were back inside underneath the coziness of our comforters (well, that's nothing new). With this cold winter weather and the sun going down earlier and earlier, we can't be bothered to go outside at all. In fact, we've been inside so much that even our cats are starting to get tired of us! That's why we've collected a flurry of feline funnies for you to pursue while weathering the cold winter winds (from the warmth of your own home).No matter rain or shine, snow or sleet, these cold-weather cat memes are sure to keep your hearts and fingers warm while any sort of storm rages outside. Now we just need a cup of hot chocolate to keep us company while our cats take up the whole heater. Not only is it the purrfect day to stay inside, but it's also the purrfect day to scroll through these feline funnies. Enjoy!
author: Blakeseidel
excerpt: A Flurry of Fluffy Feline Funnies for Fuzzy Feline Expurrts to Purruse While Weathering the Cold Winter Winds - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Brrrrrrrrr….it's cold outside, feline fam! All of a sudden, we're wrapped up in giant, poofy coats, bundled up in scarves and hats, and wishing we were back inside underneath the coziness of our comforters (well, that's nothing new). With this cold winter weather and the sun going down earlier and earlier, we can't be bothered to go outside at all. In fact, we've been inside so much that even our cats are starting to get tired of us! That's why we've collected a flurry of feline funnies for you to pursue while weathering the cold winter winds (from the warmth of your own home).

No matter rain or shine, snow or sleet, these cold-weather cat memes are sure to keep your hearts and fingers warm while any sort of storm rages outside. Now we just need a cup of hot chocolate to keep us company while our cats take up the whole heater. Not only is it the purrfect day to stay inside, but it's also the purrfect day to scroll through these feline funnies. Enjoy!
